enum  ControlType { NotControl, NormGeneExon, NormGeneIntron, ControlAffx }
 

Encoding of the pgf file probeset_type column, used by the qc report code to identify controls.


enum  SnpOffsets { Aforward, Bforward, Areverse, Breverse }
 

Snp chips with 4 blocks are defined to have 4 groups (blocks) of probes and the order is defined to be: group 1 - probes interrogating forward direction of A allele.

Detailed Description

Collection of atoms that measure target that should be absent or present at the same time.

NOTE The Probe, Atom and ProbeSet classes were determined to be wasting valuable RAM and are being transitioned to the ProbeList class. Please code accordingly.

Definition at line 349 of file ProbeSet.h.

enum ProbeSet::SnpOffsets

Snp chips with 4 blocks are defined to have 4 groups (blocks) of probes and the order is defined to be: group 1 - probes interrogating forward direction of A allele.

group 2 - probes interrogating forward direction of B allele. group 3 - probes interrogating reverse direction of A allele. group 4 - probes interrogating reverse direction of B allele.
